description: Strengthening the Philippines' Institutional Capacity to Adapt to Climate Change

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: This project will achieve: (1) base line risk scenarios, including vulnerability maps and Climate risk reduction (CRR)/adaptation monitoring system developed for priority sectors; (2) adaptation options for key sectors assessed,  valued & least cost alternatives prioritized, including ‘ no regrets’ options: (3) entry points for CRR in key national plans/planning & regulatory(e.g. EIA) process & CCA/UNDAF, identified and prioritized CCA adaptation best practices recommended for integration; (4) CRR mainstreaming guidelines adopted by key national government agencies and selected local governments;  (5) Selected local development / comprehensive land use plans reflect CRR measures; (6) existing capacities and gaps of key NGAs, selected LGUs and local HEIs for CRR work assessed; (7) awareness of key national & local stakeholders raised on climate change issues; (8) CRR planning& implementation competencies of key stakeholders enhanced/ increased; (9) enhanced capacities of local stakeholders through demonstration projects on the best practices to improve local coping mechanisms, including alternativelivelihoods.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Climate Change Adaptation-NEDA
